name: QuadraSwatch
description:
QuadraSwatch is a puzzle block game. Combining blocks creates a new block based on additive color. Every combination also increases the new block's number. Combine two secondary-colored blocks with high enough numbers for massive points.

The music in QuadraSwatch was created by Mark Sparling. He made 70 songs in 70 days and released them on /r/gamedev under Creative Commons.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions...feel free to send them to ryankampmeier at gmail dot com
